steps: step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Hover over list item
step 3: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 4: Hover over list item
step 5: Click on link 'Apple'
step 6: Hover over link
step 7: Click on span  -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 8: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout'
step 9: Hover over list item
step 10: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 11: Hover over link
step 12: Click on span  -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 13: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout'
step 14: Hover over link
step 15: Click on span
step 16: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout'
step 17: Click on button  -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 18: Hover over div
step 19: Click on input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 20: Hover over div
step 21: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 22: Click on input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 23: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 24: Click on div
